gr.interamerican.wicket.creators
Class PropertiesBasedMultipleSelectionsDataTableCreator<B extends Serializable>

java.lang.Object
  gr.interamerican.wicket.creators.AbstractDataTableCreator<B>
      gr.interamerican.wicket.creators.PropertiesBasedDataTableCreator<B>
          gr.interamerican.wicket.creators.PropertiesBasedMultipleSelectionsDataTableCreator<B>
Type Parameters:
B - type of bean.
All Implemented Interfaces:
DataTableCreator<B>, Serializable
public class PropertiesBasedMultipleSelectionsDataTableCreator<B extends Serializable>
extends PropertiesBasedDataTableCreator<B>

Implementation of a DataTableCreator based on an array of given properties. If the properties given are empty or null, then all the properties of the bean are used. The created DataTable has a column with CheckBoxes.

See Also:
Serialized Form

setDisablePaging

public void setDisablePaging(Boolean disablePaging)
Assigns a new value to the disablePaging. This flag controls whether the created DataTable will page its rows or not. This setting may change at any time and its change affect any tables created from that point on.

Parameters:
disablePaging - the disablePaging to set
